A4.text: Pearl Harbor is a lagoon harbor on the island of Oʻahu, Hawaii, United States

A5.text: Oʻahu was the target of a surprise attack on Pearl Harbor by the Empire of Japan on December 7, 1941

A6.text: The USS Arizona Memorial at Pearl Harbor is located on Oʻahu
